column5: I am new to the site, right now I live out west (Calgary), but will be returning home to Ontario soon. I have a question for anybody that might know. I have been offered a cabin on Lawless lake ( Quebec) to use this summer, just wondering if there is any good fish in the lake or a short drive from the lake. Just looking for a good place to go for two weeks in July with the family within about 3 hours of Chesterville Ontario. Thanks to anyone that will respond.
I don't know the area but welcome to the site I'm  sure if someone know the lake they will give you some info

I also have nothing to offer on Lawless Lake but we do have a fair number of members from La Belle Province, perhaps one of them will chime in.  Best wishes on your return to Ontario and welcome to OFC.

nuts...I was hoping this post was about a lake where you can use dynamite, drink while you're doing it, and keep everything you explode...if this is the kind of anarchy that goes on at lawless lake then please let me know
